name: Point Blank Master

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Weapon Specialization with selected ranged weapon.

sections.body: Choose one type of ranged weapon. You do not provoke attacks of opportunity when firing the selected weapon while threatened.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Using a ranged weapon while you are threatened provokes attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Normal

sections.body: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Point Blank Master as a combat style feat, but he must have Weapon Focus instead of Weapon Specialization in the selected weapon.
sections.name: Special

description: You are adept at firing ranged weapons in close quarters.
